content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 43, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 57, "index": 16}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 19}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 32}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 34}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft purple_terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta blocks around 1 purple dye block in the crafting table. The first step is to move one terracotta block to the crafting table. I have selected slot 19 because it is the first slot in my inventory that contains terracotta.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 43, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 57, "index": 16}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 19}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 41, "index": 32}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 34}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}]

thought: Now I need to place another terracotta block to the right of the first one. The next terracotta block in my inventory is located in slot 19, so I will move it to slot 2 which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 3 with quantity 1
